::Zardus/Oblitertron::

Oblitertron growls at Dark Lavatron, raising his weapon, about to open fire. 
Out of the corner of his eyes, he sees Zardus motioning for him to back off. 
Reluctantly, Dark One takes a step back, watching Zardus fly forward.

Oblitertron had been looking forward to killing these puny bots, maybe battle 
would still be possible....
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus looks at Lavatron, thinking the offer over. Bots like these could be 
an asset, yesss...

"What kind of alliance do you have in mind?" Zardus asks mindly, his weapon 
ready just in case, "You joining us?"
